attributes.action: support the Rus In Urbe movement (otherwise known as “Larks for our grandchildren”)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Much British wildlife has found sanctuary in the nation’s cities. Flowers, insects, reptiles, birds and mammals now thrive in the benign environment of urban parkland, free from persecution and pesticides.
We wish to take this happy trend onward by asking the custodians of larger open spaces in our cities and towns to plant, each year, an acre or two of corn or wheat.
Through this simple, cheap and visually appealing measure, maybe in a generation or so we’d hear the song of the skylark over our skyscrapers.
